story: ^Growl*... Hello stranger, you aint from these tracks are *growl*.. you?

c-3: ^ Sorry monster, didnt mean to talk to you!

Right: ^I thought so!, there isn't a corner of this place where I havent been
^Do you happen to know where I can get a key to the door to my left?
Yes: ^I need to defeat the monster to find my kids!
^I just need to get the key!
Whyask: ^"Aaa I see kids... Kids are to much trouble in my opinion, I eat my small ones, but I suppose humans dont do that?"
^"Willy has the key, just take the way to the right"
NeedKeyNow: ^"gr Gra gra, rude motha fucker aint you? GET OUT OF MY FACE BITCH"
Why: ^"Why do you believe that?" you say?, Gra Gra Gra...
^I know this place like the back of my hand, you make me angry son!
assumptions: ^"Who do you call monster! ... gR grrrr. Wait a sec, aint I a monster?.
